title: About
text: Luméra is a hybrid makeup-meets-skincare brand designed for the modern individual who values both beauty and health. The brand focuses on clean, effective, and sustainable formulas that enhance natural beauty while nourishing the skin.

title: PRODUCTS
text:
Radiance Boost Serum Foundation Medium coverage with Vitamin C and peptides for a radiant finish
HydraGlow Blush Stick Cream blush infused with aloe vera and rosehip oil for a natural flush and hydration.
Soft Shield Setting Mist A setting spray with blue light protection and probiotics to protect and balance skin.
Bright Eyes Concealer With caffeine and chamomile to reduce puffiness and brighten under eyes.

title: INGREDIENTS
text:
Skin-Loving Formulas|: Hydration: 1.Hyaluronic Acid: Plumps and hydrates skin. 2.Squalane: Lightweight moisture.
Nourishment: 1.Jojoba Oil: Balances and soothes. 2.Rosehip Oil: Rich in Vitamins A & C for glow.
Anti-Aging & Brightening: 1.Vitamin C: Brightens and evens skin tone. 2.Peptides: Boost elasticity and smooth fine lines.
Calming & Soothing: 1.Niacinamide: Reduces redness and minimizes pores. 2.Aloe Vera: Hydrates and soothes irritation.
Acne Control: 1.Salicylic Acid: Clears pores. 2.Kaolin Clay: Absorbs oil for a matte finish.
UV & Digital Protection: 1.Zinc Oxide: Broad-spectrum SPF. 2.Lutein: Shields against blue light.
Avoided: Parabens, phthalates, synthetic fragrances, talc, and mineral oil. Perfectly balanced for healthy, glowing skin!
